subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: A few from Evp Maker
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Steve,

I got started with EVP in 1987 after reading Jï¿½rgenson's book. We had
an EVP group in Cologne where I lived at that time. I've written some
words about the development of the "chopping method" on my EVP pages:
http://www.tonbandstimmen.de/sprach_e.htm

Stefan

-- 

> Yes, i'm messing around with that now.  Seems like you covered all 
> bases with this little program.  What made you build this program?  How 
> did you get started with EVP?

> -Steve H.



> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
>>
>> Hi Steve,
>> 
>> > [...] You and Frank are definitely on to something with these 
> methods,
>> > so what's next? Is there an EVP Maker part 2 in the works with echo?
>> 
>> There's an echo function in EVPmaker, but it's not a "live" echo,
>> it can only be applied to the source audio file between playbacks.
>> 
>> Stefan
>>
